text: Solid burgers and friendly staff. The mac and cheese is a must. Came with the family and everyone left full and happy.
Good American food but a bit pricey for what you get. Steak was cooked well.
Best sushi in town. Fresh fish and the ramen is incredible. Will definitely be back.
Authentic Japanese experience. Sake selection is great. Service was a bit slow on a busy Saturday.
Love the pasta here. Feels like a real Italian kitchen. The tiramisu is to die for.
Pizza was good, pasta was okay. Nice patio in the summer.
Amazing curries and the lunch buffet is a steal. So much flavor. Can get spicy so ask if you're sensitive.
Great vegetarian options. The dal and naan are perfect. A bit crowded at dinner.
Tacos are legit and the margaritas hit the spot. Fun vibe, good for a casual night out.
Decent tacos, nothing special. Bar is loud on Friday nights. Good for groups.
Romantic and delicious. The duck confit was perfect. Wine list is small but well chosen.
Lovely bistro. Coq au vin was excellent. A bit on the expensive side but worth it for a special occasion.
Dumplings and mapo tofu are my go-to. Spicy and satisfying. Takeout holds up well.
Good Chinese food, generous portions. Service can be hit or miss when they're busy.
Best grain bowls and smoothies. Healthy and actually tasty. Great for a quick lunch.
Nice vegetarian spot. Vegan pastries are hit or miss but the bowls are consistently good.
